name: The Public's Price
description:
You're a detained  eco-fighter on your way to interrogation. Will you sell out to save yourself or fight against the system that's exploiting and destroying the world for profit?

I'm a 3rd-year college student and this is a short story game I made in a few days for my Environmental Film Final! 

I made this game because I look around at corporations exploiting people and land, breaking laws, abusing workers, and causing ~80% of climate change all for the sake of their own profits and interests. It makes me sick, and I wanted to create an experience that channels the hopelessness and anger I feel.

Download for free, or feel free to donate! Any donation will be given to https://earthjustice.org/ an organization who fights against capitalist greed and people suffering for it.

Also check out https://www.ciel.org/ and this list of other organizations dedicated to the fight:
